publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda ʾIrob, ṭabiya ʾƎndamosa, qušät ʾAwado

note.desc: The church might have existed at the site before the 17th cent. Mäzgäbä Śǝllase, the 17th-18th-cent. head of the monastery of Gundä Gunde. The place of ʿAwado, where Mäzgäbä Śǝllase is said to have been born (also according to his Vita), is located nearby.
note.ab: Däbr. The recent church building stands near the old one, which is intact. The old church of Gäbäbinno Mikael is located in the vicinity (probably an old rock-hewn structure, but the books are recent). Gundä Gunde is said to be not very far (some 5 hour distance walk).

22 Mss. photographed: EMS-001 “Missal”; EMS-002 “Miracles of Mary; Miracles of Jesus¸Miracels of Michael¸Miracles of the Saviour of the World”; EMS-003 “Missal”; EMS-004 “Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus (fols.3ra-68vb); Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus (fols. 69ra-91ra)(92ra-117rb)”; EMS-005 “Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael ”; EMS-006 “Homily on the Sabbath of Christians; Book of the letter (from Heaven)”; EMS-007 “Vita of Mäzgäbä Śellase”; EMS-008 “Image of Raguʾel”; EMS-009 “The Hope of Praise”; EMS-010 “Sägogawa Maryam (fols.2r-20r); Mälkǝʾa Täklä Haymanot (fols. 24r-38r)”; EMS-011 “Mahǝletä ṣǝgge (fols. 1ra-43rb); Mälkǝʾa Pawlos wä-Petros (fols. 43rb-54ra); Mälkǝʾa Kiros (fols. 54ra-56va)”; EMS-012 “Book of the Funeral Rite”; EMS-013 “Story of Mary”; EMS-014 “Prayer of St. Mary on Bartas (fols. 2r-37v); Prayer of St. Qopros (fols. 39r-57v); Psalm 118 (fols. 58r-70v); Prayer of Mary to Christos (fols. 71r-73r); Gate of light (fols. 73v-81v); Song of Songs (fols. 82r-91r); Prayer of Jesus Christ (fols. 91v-95r)”; EMS-015 “Lectionary”; EMS-016 “Gospel of John”; EMS-017 “Book of the Feast of Christ's Baptism”; EMS-018 “Mǝʿraf (fols. 4ra-14rb); Dǝggwa (fols. 15ra-50rb) (Wazenna); Kǝstät zä-ʾaryam (fols.53ra)-62rb)”; EMS-019 “Vite of Giyorgis; Miracles of Giyorgis”; EMS-020 “Yä-ḥǝmamat sälamta (fols. 1ra-14ra); Salam-prayer to Giorgis (fols. 15ra-16vb); Zǝmmare (fols. 17ra-26rb); Mäwaśǝʾt (fols. 27ra-48ra); Zǝmmare for säne (fols. 49ra-56va); Mäṣḥafä ḥassab (Computers) (fols. 57v-64v)”; EMS-021 “Vite of Mäzgäba Sǝllare; Miracles of Mäzgäba Sǝllare; Image of Mäzgäba Sǝllare; Salutation to Mäzgäba Sǝllare”; EMS-022 “Four Gospels”.
